game.name: Where We Went
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: Where We Went is a narrative driven puzzle game. Step into the role of a mysterious character that can control ancient guardians to solve puzzles. Uncover the story behind your visit to the tomb and the reason for its existence!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Where We Went is a narrative driven puzzle game. Step into the role of a mysterious character that can control ancient guardians to solve puzzles. Uncover the story behind your visit to the tomb and the reason for its existence!
